name: Carboplatin
contraindications: NOTE: Aluminum reacts with carboplatin causing precipitate formation and loss of potency, therefore, needles or intravenous sets containing aluminum parts that may come in contact with the drug must not be used for the preparation or administration of carboplatin injection.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Each mL of carboplatin injection, USP contains 10 mg of carboplatin, USP in water for injection and is available in individual cartons as follows:
                  
                     
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           NDC Number
                           Contents
                           Size

                           50 mg
                           5 mL Multidose Vial

                           45 mL Multidose Vial

                           600 mg
                           60 mL Multidose Vial
                        
                        
                           16729-295-38
                           1000 mg
                           100 mL Multidose Vial
adverseReactions:
Carboplatin injection is contraindicated in patients with a history of severe allergic reactions to cisplatin or other platinum-containing compounds.
                  Carboplatin injection should not be employed in patients with severe bone marrow depression or significant bleeding.
